Inc.","details":"Provides raw/real quantity system for securities with dynamic valuations      RAW vs REAL quantities:      - RAW: Stored quantity, never changes during corporate actions      - REAL: Displayed quantity, adjusted by cumulative ratios      This enables gas-efficient corporate actions:      - 2-for-1 split: Update one ratio instead of N balances      - Stock dividend: Update one ratio instead of N balances      Used by share class tokens, fund units, ETFs, etc.","errors":{"AccessControl_CallerIsNotAuthorized(address,bytes4)":[{"params":{"caller":"Address attempting the applyBalanceAdjustment(uint256,uint256,s.details: This updates the cumulative adjustment ratio

params.adjustmentDen: Denominator of the cost basis adjustment ratio
params.adjustmentNum: Numerator of the cost basis adjustment ratio

returns._0: The balance adjusted for corporate actions
The real quantity after applying adjustments
The real cost basis after adjustments

packedSelectors().details: Each selector is 4 bytes, packed sequentially with no padding      MUST NOT include packedSelectors() itself in the returned selectors      MUST be a pure function (no state access)

returns._0: The raw total supply before adjustments
The total supply adjusted for corporate actions

applyBalanceAdjustment(uint256,uint256,s.notice: Apply a balance adjustment (used by CorporateActionsFacet)

balanceOf(address).notice: Returns the balance of an account (real quantity after adjustments)

convertRawToReal(uint256).notice: Convert raw quantity to real quantity

convertRawToRealCostBasis(uint256).notice: Convert raw cost basis to real cost basis

convertRealToRaw(uint256).notice: Convert real quantity to raw quantity

packedSelectors().notice: Returns all function selectors for this facet as tightly packed bytes

rawBalanceOf(address).notice: Returns the raw balance of an account (stored quantity)

rawTotalSupply().notice: Returns the raw total supply (stored quantity)

totalSupply().notice: Returns the total supply (real quantity after adjustments)
